alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Hamilton; Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 1:24PM EDT until May 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hamilton County in eastern New York... Northwestern Fulton County in eastern New York... Southeastern Herkimer County in eastern New York... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 124 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Middleville, or near Little Falls, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Herkimer, Little Falls, Dolgeville, Stratford, Middleville, Fairfield, Norway, Oregon, Nobleboro, Curtis, Countryman, Knappville, Burrell Corners, Kelhi Corners, Wilmurt Corners, Shedd Corners, Eatonville, Old City, Gray and Powley Place. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
